snippet: New England Patriots' kicker Stephen Gostkowski is a Super Bowl winner, an All Pro, and now a crime solver....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots' kicker Stephen Gostkowski is a Super Bowl winner, an All Pro, and now a crime solver.

headline.main: Patriots' Gostkowski Helped Police Recover His Stolen iPad
headline.print_headline: Patriots' Gostkowski Helped Police Recover His Stolen iPad
